name: Fizmo - Tile Puzzles (Browser)
description:
Fizmo is a tiled puzzle game with over 70 levels, created by D3MD0GG0S767.

It is made for computers, so mobile won't support some features.

How to Play

Use the arrow keys or click and drag to move the colored blocks.

Once each block is at its colored target, you complete the level.

ON/OFF tiles can be changed from non-solid to solid by pressing the spacebar or clicking on them.

Brown crates can be moved by clicking and dragging them in the desired direction.

More Features

The Level Designer contains 3 important features:

  • Design: Choose a level size and start making your level! All the tools are there. The X tool lets you delete a level part. However, make sure not to delete the walls of the level. This can make it unplayable. Press the Test button to test if your level is possible. Once you're finished, press Save to get your copy-and-paste level code!
  • Load Level: Paste your level code here to edit the level. Play it using Test!
  • Other Levels: Some official community-created levels for you to try out!

Once you're done creating a level, why not share it with the world in the comments section below?

Have fun playing Fizmo!
